description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) used RDP for lateral movement.(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019)(Citation: Crowdstrike GTR2020 Mar 2020) [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) used NATBypass to expose local RDP ports on compromised systems to the Internet.(Citation: apt41_dcsocytec_dec2022)
